mapper.select: SELECT id, type, title, data, class_name, class_id, teacher_id, student_count, finish_count, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted FROM class_task WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, type, title, data, class_name, class_id, teacher_id, student_count, finish_count, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted FROM class_task WHERE class_id = #{classId}

SELECT id, type, title, data, class_name, class_id, teacher_id, student_count, finish_count, created_at, updated_at, is_deleted FROM class_task WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_task (type, title, data, class_name, class_id, teacher_id, student_count, finish_count) VALUES (#{type}, #{title}, #{data}, #{className}, #{classId}, #{teacherId}, #{studentCount}, #{finishCount})
mapper.update:
